name: Radarr
description: Automated movie downloading and organization. Monitors RSS feeds and downloads via torrent/usenet.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  radarr:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/radarr:latest
    container_name: radarr
    environment:
      - PUID={{PUID}}
      - PGID={{PGID}}
      - TZ={{TZ}}
    volumes:
      - {{CONFIG_PATH}}:/config
      - {{MOVIES_PATH}}:/movies
      - {{DOWNLOADS_PATH}}:/downloads
    ports:
      - 7878:7878
    restart: unless-stopped
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=radarr"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=automation"

notes: Requires a download client (transmission, qbittorrent, etc.)
Configure indexers via Prowlarr or manually
